name: Samsara 轮回
description:
Enter a world thrown out of balance. Nature has separated into its three physical states and is rapidly deteriorating with no hope of returning to harmony. It's up to you to restore the balance. Use your abilities over solid, liquid, and gas to traverse levels and solve puzzles in this 2D side-scroller.

by Haoyu Wang, Wen Pang, Meijun Fu, Moss Dooley, Ziyang Liu & Quinn Liu
